title: it took away my rp
body: i had 3333 rp when i bought my katarina skin that cost 520 and after i bought it i had 2239 rp. if you do the math it doesnt match up, please help.

replies.body:
Hey Groovy, 

My tools show that you the skin subtracted the correct amount of RP. Could you verify this issue exists after you log out and log back in?
it came back after a while, thank you very much though
